section.title: Further Recommendations for Community and Academics
section.p: CYou now know how to get involved with Belhaven MCS's communty and a few of the academic experiences you will participate in. Here are a few more recommendations on how to maximize your time here at Belhaven.

subsection.title: Build a Resume
subsection.p: Go ahead and write a resume. You won't have much to put on a resume yet, but you will as time goes on. Write your resume now, and you update it each semester. If you need help getting started, our Student Care center is a great place to get started.

subsection.title: Take Additional Courses
subsection.p:
We recommend that every student either selects a double major or a minor (speaking of resume). A few academic choices we feel are good ones include:
Computer Science
Chemistry
Art, Music, Dance, or Theatre
Biblical Studies
Graphic Design
Web Design (minor)
Oh yeah... don't forget to join the Maker Campus.
